RelatedSentence: Cyber attacks cost U.S. businesses up to $ 140 billion and 500,000 jobs a year in losses , according to a joint study conducted by McAfee and the Center for Strategic and International Studies .

Chinese cyber spying on businesses has become so rampant at this point that it 's almost a joke - especially considering the fact that the Chinese government routinely denies such accusations , even in the face of hard evidence , which is why I 'm almost willing to give the NSA the benefit of the doubt on this one and assume that the tampering with network equipment was to catch the Chinese army in the act .
